EmailTemplate.description: Sends email informing of an account needing a title consultant
EmailTemplate.name: Notify of Needed Consultant
EmailTemplate.subject: Please assign a Consultant to Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A Customer Inquiry was just created related to {!Customer_Inquiry__c.Account__c}, but there is no member of your team assigned to the account. Please visit the page and populate Title Consultant ASAP; the Customer Inquiry will automatically be assigned to that user.
640 Ellicott St #321 Buffalo, NY 14203 www.acvauctions.com
Want to change how you receive these emails? You can update your preferences or unsubscribe.
